items.sentence: The doctor assured Tom that Mary would get well.
In any case, I've already entirely forgiven you.
I think that Tom was too afraid to say anything.
How long have you been living in this apartment?
I know that both Tom and Mary have been injured.
Why do you think Tom is reluctant to drink that?
Tom seemed reluctant to talk to Mary about that.
I never would've guessed that Tom could do that.
Do you want me to help you carry your suitcases?
I doubt that Tom really has the time to do that.
That's happening right now, as a matter of fact.
That's the woman that Tom used to be married to.
Tom doesn't have as many pairs of shoes as Mary.
It's none of your business what I'm going to do.
Tom asked us a lot of questions about Australia.
Please tell Tom that I'll be a few minutes late.
Tom just finished reading the book you lent him.
The children are playing football in the street.
My grandfather arrived unexpectedly from Boston.
There are some strawberries in the refrigerator.
